alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 11:56AM EST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Recent heavy rainfall will continue to cause rises on the Green River. The river is expected to crest at Paradise and Calhoun late this weekend. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 20.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 25.8 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
